What are top scoring 13 letter words in scrabble ?

What is the spelling of 13 ?

Spelling of 13 is THIRTEEN

What are few common 13 letter words ?

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word extemporizing?

Meaning- Speaking or performing on something immediately without any rehearsal.score-34

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word ventriloquize ?

Meaning- To produce a sound like a ventriloquist.Score-34

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word gyrofrequency?

Meaning- The frequency with which electrons moves in a magnetic field.Score-34

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word thymectomizes?

Meaning- An operation or surgery perform to remove thymus (organ) from the body.Score-34

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word psychophysics

Meaning- A branch of psychology that studies the relationship between the physical stimulus and its effect in mind.Score-33

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word jabberwockies ?

Meaning- Things which are termed as nonsense.Score-33

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word xerophthalmic?

Meaning- A condition in which there is excessive dryness in cornea due to deficiency of vitamin A ,Score-32

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word soliloquizing?

Meaning- To utter soliloquy, which is a speech in a play in which actor speaks to himself/herself.Score-32

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word misemphasized?

Meaning- To emphasizeon something which is not correct.Score-32

What is the meaning and score in scrabble of 13 letter word prizefighters ?

Meaning- A boxing match which usually fighter fights to win money.Score-31
